Key:
(Lots of odd things happened today, things I would
never have experienced in a normal setting. It was
all so draining and I just wanted to rest, but...)
*Sigh*...
What's the matter, Shido?

Just wondering what you guys are doing
in my room...
Well, we don't know what else to do in this world.
Oh, it appears that we are all gathered.
No, uh... It's more like a girls' night in...

(I thought I'd be able to rest up tonight...
Wait, Arusu is sitting over there...)
Arusu, you're not going to join them?
Correct. I am simply observing the situation.
I see. So, have we been helpful to you?

Yes. By creating an unusual simulation, I was able
to gather some interesting data. But... I think I
still lack sufficient information to define love.
Well, I did sort of question your methods...

Observing your behavior in various situations
allows me to collect more data in regards to love.
So... We're still going to continue?

Yes. At this point, this is the best way to gather
information.
I-I see...

(I wonder what kind of situation would be best
to show what love is.)
(...I guess the situation can't be helped.)

But it's crazy to see so many people in this room.
I guess I'll just sit and watch for a little
while.
Talk to Tohka.
Talk to Origami.
Talk to Yoshino.
Next
Talk to Kotori.
Talk to the Yamai Sisters.
Talk to Miku.
Back
Talk to Kurumi.
